meanings.definition: A representation or imitation of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a simulacre of a famous landmark using clay.
meanings.sent2: The wax museum displayed a simulacre of a popular celebrity.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the simulacre of their teacher made out of balloons.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a simulacre of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The puppet show featured a colorful simulacre of a dragon.
